changelog:
Syberia OS for chiron updated!

Current build date: 01/21/2019
firmware *REQUIRED* : V10.0.2.0 (latest stable)
Minimum TWRP required : 3.2.3 (wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox

Changelog:
- Implemented wakelock and alarm blockers
- Added CAF VoLTE icon
- Disable Quick Settings on secure lockscreen
- Merge tag 'LA.UM.7.6.2.r1-05700-89xx.0' in HW/bluetooth
- Connectivity: improved TCP parameters  
- Fixed NPE with DropBoxManager
- Fixed NPE due to ext telephony
- Fixed CTS failure in camera
- Fixed QS dev tiles area
- Update translations

Device Specific:
*upstreamed trees to wight554 ones
*kernel compiled with DragonTC clang 8

Download:  check OTA or visit our Downloads Portal https://syberiaos.com/downloads
